meaningMnemonic: Time to get <kanji>together</kanji> and <kanji>forget</kanji> the <kanji>year</kanji>... what a terrible year, good thing a new one is coming. This get together is a <vocabulary>year end party</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
